articles.title: Josh Allen leads Bills over Jags 27-24 for Buffalo’s first road playoff victory in 33 years
articles.description:
Allen found Brandin Cooks for 36 yards just before the two-minute warning and then capped the go-ahead drive with a 1-yard touchdown run in which Jacksonville let him score.

The post Josh Allen leads Bills over Jags 27-24 for Buffalo’s first road playoff victory in 33 years appeared first on Boston.com.
